text: The Nilgai (Boselaphus tragocamelus) is an antelope found in Asia. It commonly seen in India, Bangladesh, Nepal and eastern Pakistan. The mature males appear ox-like and are also known as blue bulls. The nilgai is the biggest Asian antelope. The species was described in 1766. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Bovines Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Nilgai
